      • newCoordFromBearingAndDistance

        public static LatLong newCoordFromBearingAndDistance(LatLong origin,
                                                     double bearing,
                                                     double distance)
        Extrapolate latitude/longitude given a heading and distance thanks to http://www.movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong.html
        Parameters:
        origin - Point of origin
        bearing - bearing to navigate
        distance - distance to be added
        Returns:
        New point with the added distance

      • moveCoordinate

        public static LatLong moveCoordinate(LatLong origin,

        Offset a coordinate by a local distance
        Parameters:
        origin - location in WGS84
        xMeters - Offset distance in the east direction
        yMeters - Offset distance in the north direction
        Returns:
        new coordinate with the offset
